about_the_game:
Original Score for Metis One by the infamous Cloe Song!

Includes the following two albums in mp3 format:

The Metis One OST

1. Launch Bay 7
2. Metis One
3. Red Alert!
4. ステージ 2
5. Turret Torment
6. Space Case
7. Frakking Bot
8. Junkyard Shuffle
9. Warehouse Fire
10. Vengeance for Eris Base
11. Satellite Dinner
12. Nebular Impromptu
13. Interstellar Mayhem

Sound and Ruminations from Eris Base

1. Mess Hall (Afterhours)
2. Stargazing
3. Simulation 64
4. pointCrush(ex)
5. Eris Embarks
6. Spacy Jones
7. Dilithium Stimpack
8. Asteroid Pinball

Note: Both albums will be placed in an OST folder wherever you have installed Metis One to. [PathTo]Steam>steamapps>common>Metis One
